MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW6 postcode area of Cotebrook, affecting properties in Stable Lane, Fishpool Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:34PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by suspected third party damage to an underground cable. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:11PM on 15th March 2021.
